about_the_game:
**Underwater Cycling** takes you on an exhilarating underwater adventure where you as main character race on high-tech bicycles that glide through the ocean's depths.

Immerse yourself in stunning aquatic environments, from vibrant coral reefs and ancient shipwrecks to deep-sea trenches teeming with mysterious marine life. Each race presents its own set of challenges, such as navigating strong currents, avoiding hidden traps, and outsmarting the sea creatures that either aid or block your path.

As you progress, collect power-ups to boost your speed, enhance your bike’s capabilities, and unlock new, customizable underwater bikes. Engage in multiplayer races, tackle time trials, and complete unique underwater challenges. Whether you're exploring for hidden treasures or battling fierce competitors, every race is a test of skill, strategy, and endurance.

Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate underwater cycling champion?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 106 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 106 MB available space
